data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
With my friend Darena we want to build component based system for
    building web information system - WIS:: namespace. We try this in
    some modules and out idea works. I can compare this idea with
    Borland's Turbo Vision components for building nice IDEs in DOS many
    years later - but now for web. Object-oriented of course. Many
    modules (now tens, but early hundreds) in new namespaces WIS::.
    Thank you for registering.
